about_the_game:
《Dark of chroe》 ※Support subtitles: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese

There are rumors among people that there are secret treasures asleep in the depths of the forest, and there are rumors that there are secret treasures that can lift any curse and realize any wish.
It was the place where the missionaries were driven out of the palace, lost their jobs and forced to resign.
This is an adventure fantasy journey RPG sketch, you can start "humanity" by defeating each level

———————————————————————————————————————————————— —————————

The heroine Chroe was cursed for eating dog meat

In order to find a way to remove the curse, she went to the ancient forest alone.
The wonderful religious group in the forest asks Chroe to offer "humanity" to lift the curse.
With nowhere to go, she embarked on this journey...

The game is built with a soul-like setting, and it takes physical effort to attack, defend, and dodge.
When you die, you will return to the temple, and you will reincarnate again and again.
Until, you find the way of salvation...

【Game Features】

▹ Soul-like action gameplay of real-time combat
▹ Collect materials to strengthen the weapon system
▹ Customize strengthening ability value
▹ Explosive clothing system that changes clothing with the value of life
▹ Collect 27 abusive events, no corrections throughout!

【Operation method】

1. Cancel [Esc], [X]
2. Decide and speed up the battle [Enter], [Z]
3. Menu [Esc], [X]
4. Fast forward message [Ctrl]
5. Hide dialog box [Q]
6. Dialogue automatic mode [shift], press [X] to end

content_descriptors.notes: Contains some mind control and brainwashing Sexual assault / undesirable intercourse content. All characters are over the age of 18.

name: DARK OF CHROE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Windows® XP 或是以上之版本
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB RAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB RAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
